item.title: Research
item.description: RDNA Balance: Load Balancing by Isolation of Elephant Flows using Strict Source Routing (2019). Rodolfo V. Valentim, Cristina. K. Dominicini, Diego R. Mafioletti1, Rodolfo S. Villaca, Moises R. N. Ribeiro, Magnos Martinello - LANCOMM Student Workshop (Latin American Student Workshop on Data Communication Networks), 2019, Gramado - RS RDNA Balance: Balanceamento de Carga por Isolamento de Fluxos Elefante em Data Centers com Roteamento na Origem (2019). Rodolfo V. Valentim, Cristina.

item.title: Render LaTeX using KaTeX
item.description: Enable katex by adding katex = "true" to the front matter +++ katex = "true" +++ It’s almost a dropin alternative to the mathjax solution,you should just choose one of them. Inline math looks like this This is text with inline math $\sum_{n=1}^{\infty} 2^{-n} =1$ This is text with inline math $\sum_{n=1}^{\infty} 2^{-n} = 1$ and with math blocks: $$\sum_{n=1}^{\infty} 2^{-n} =1$$ $$ \sum_{n=1}^{\infty} 2^{-n} = 1 $$

item.title: About Rodolfo
item.description: Hugo is a static site engine written in Go. It makes use of a variety of open source projects including: Cobra Viper J Walter Weatherman Cast Learn more and contribute on GitHub. Setup Some fun facts about Hugo: Built in Go Loosely inspired by Jekyll Primarily developed by spf13 on the train while commuting to and from Manhattan. Coded in Vim using spf13-vim Have questions or suggestions?
